title: Wilsonian Renormalization Group Approach to ${\cal N}=2$ Supersymmetric Sigma Models
abstract: We derive the Wilsonian renormalization group equation in two dimensional ${\cal N}=2$ supersymmetric nonlinear sigma models. This equation shows that the sigma models on compact Einstein K\"{a}hler manifolds are aymptotically free. This result is gerenal and does not depend on the specific forms of the K\"{a}hler potentials. We also examine the renormalization group flow in a new model which connects two manifolds with different global symmetries.
